GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.79
GSD.description:
net: wwan: iosm: fix memory leak in ipc_wwan_dellink

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit 2ce2348c2858d723f7fe389dead9b43b08e0944e, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 2a54f2c7793409736f2e5ea101e050b3f1997088. For more details please see the references link.
